Dragons

Fifteen distinct species of dragon have been observed in the wake of the Draconic Awakening, an dragons of a similar type often behaved similarly in the years since:

  • Metallic dragons (generally of a selfless disposition)
    • Gold dragons: Self-organized into the Shining Justicars; an extra-judicial militia of peace-bringers who travel the land righting any perceived wrongs
    • Silver dragons: Often went into hiding in plain sight; no formal collective of them is known
    • Brass dragons: Took well to building their hoards via mercenary work, commonly taking jobs protecting Wrakarr trade caravans from blue dragons
    • Bronze dragons: Many of them came upon an area that they felt was not sufficiently fortified, and instituted local martial law with the armies they raised
    • Copper dragons: TODO
  • Gem dragons (generally of an indifferent disposition toward others)
    • Amethyst dragons: TODO
    • Emerald dragons: TODO
    • Sapphire dragons: TODO
    • Crystal dragons: TODO
    • Topaz dragons: TODO
  • Chromatic dragons (generally of a self-interested disposition)
    • Red dragons: Laid claim to a territory and its people, ruling with absolute unchecked authority
    • Blue dragons: Took up profiteering, usually around the emerging merchant cities of Wrakarr
    • Green dragons: Became apex predators in their forested environments of choice, instilling fear in the local inhabitants
    • Black dragons: Became apex predators in their swampy environments of choice, instilling fear in the local inhabitants
    • White dragons: Became apex predators in their arctic environments of choice, instilling fear in the local inhabitants
